ns0:simpleDc.ns2:title: Kangiata Nunata Sermia glacier timelapse photos
ns0:simpleDc.ns2:subject: glacier timelapse photography
Greenland

ns0:dcTerms.ns2:abstract: This data set consists of several series of digital images of glaciers and the icefjord in the area of Nuuk, West Greenland. The images are saved as jpeg files. Camera information and geographical location is contained in the exif headers.
